solution_line_template: He had {initial_red_marbles} red marbles and took away {taken_red_marbles} leaving {initial_red_marbles}-{taken_red_marbles} = <<{initial_red_marbles}-{taken_red_marbles}={remaining_red_marbles}>>{remaining_red_marbles} red marbles

He took {multiplier_blue_marbles} times as many blue marbles as red marbles which is {multiplier_blue_marbles}*{taken_red_marbles} = <<{multiplier_blue_marbles}*{taken_red_marbles}={taken_blue_marbles}>>{taken_blue_marbles} blue marbles
He took {taken_blue_marbles} blue marbles from {initial_blue_marbles} leaving {initial_blue_marbles}-{taken_blue_marbles} = {remaining_blue_marbles} blue marbles
